d: A FreeSewing pattern for a 1790s shift

bodyEase.d: Controls ease in the width of the body

neckDepthFront.d: Controls depth of the front neckline

neckDepthBack.d: Controls depth of the back neckline

neckWidth.d: Controls the width of the neckline

shiftLength.d: Controls the length of the shift

gussetSize.d: Controls the size of the gusset

bicepEase.d: Controls the ease in the sleeve

sleeveBonus.d: Controls the length of the sleeve
